Articles.Content:
I am planning an interstellar trip, but where should I go?

What planet packs do you suggest? I've checked out a few, but I have some problems with them. (Sorry in advance to the makers of these mods, you made brilliant mods, but I like other styles of planets. I'm not trying to be mean. Please don't think I'm trying to be mean. ):

GEP: The planets are good, but they just look a bit bland and grey compared to how colorful the Kerbol system is.

GU: My ram would go into cardiac arrest. Gorgeous, but not for the faint computered.

The light levels series is awesome, but unfortunately buggy.

All the other mods appear (emphasis on "appear") to be outdated beyond functionality. 

Any help would be appreciated.
